data: SUS Morphine (KADIAN) Long Acting for Opioid Use Disorder
Prior to prescribing KADIAN for the treatment of Opioid Use Disorder, consider consult with site specific addiction service or provincial addiction RACE line.
Only providers who have satisfied their provincial college requirements can prescribe morphine (KADIAN) long acting for the treatment of opioid use disorder
